synopsis.text:
Everyone's favorite two-faced little sister, Umaru Doma, is back with her signature hamster hoodie and her ever-tolerant elder brother, Taihei. By day, Umaru is the epitome of perfection - a beautiful 16-year-old girl who excels in academics and sports, admired by all. But when she returns home, she sheds her perfect facade and transforms into a lazy, junk food-loving, video game-obsessed otaku, leaving all the housework to her brother.

As Umaru continues to juggle her three different personas to keep her friends from discovering her true nature, she finds herself deepening her bonds with her classmates - the kind-hearted Nana Ebina, the passionate Kirie Motoba, and the energetic Sylphinford Tachibana. But with new friendships come new questions. What did Nana ask of Umaru's brother Taihei? Who is the mysterious girl with the diamond hairpin, and why does she seem to know Umaru?

Despite the challenges that come his way, including company trips and eccentric co-workers, Taihei remains determined to take care of his little sister. As Umaru fights to maintain her secret life, she finds herself in a series of hilarious and absurd situations that are sure to keep you entertained. Will Umaru succeed in keeping her lazy, slobbish persona a secret, or will her friends discover the truth about their perfect classmate? Find out in Himouto! Umaru-chan R!
